name: Dog Discoverer 2
description:
This is the first game I've ever made, and my first game jam, GBA Winter Jam '23!

Objective

Find the dog, bring him to the exit. The dog idles until pet, then follows the player around. His name is Pinky :)

Controls

Pet: R
Use / Sprint: L
Walk / Strafe: D-Pad
Turn / Aim: A & B
Map: Select
Menu: Start

Cheats

No Clipping: UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT
Auto-map: L, SELECT,R, B, A, R, L, UP
Next Level: LEFT,R, LEFT, L, B, LEFT, RIGHT, A
Toggle FPS counter: LEFT, LEFT, LEFT, LEFT, LEFT, LEFT, LEFT, A

Source Code

Download the source code here.

Feedback

Please let me know if anything is unattributed or needs fixing. I am very new, so all input is valuable to me!
